title: This thrilling election will finally bring years of frustration and fury to an end
text:
British democracy will prove itself to be as vigorous as ever

And - we’re off! In the end, it was simply untenable to contemplate going on like this. Even the most cynical, self-serving opposition on God’s earth - even Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party - could not persevere with the outrage of denying the electorate a voice in this tumultuous national debate.

To the very last moment, the die-hards tried to sound as if their absurd obstruction was perfectly reasonable. Change the voting age to sixteen without any proper allowance of time to consider such a drastic constitutional alteration? Allow foreign nationals from other EU states to vote in UK parliamentary elections - even though no other...
description: British democracy will prove itself to be as vigorous as ever
